org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools.filters

Class ToolboxFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.hci.tools.filters.ToolboxFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ToolFilter

    public class ToolboxFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ToolFilter
    A filter that sorts tools by sub-package first, e.g. SignalProc.Input becomes Input.SignalProc

      • getFilteredPackage

        public java.lang.String[] getFilteredPackage(Tool tool)
        Specified by:
        getFilteredPackage in interface ToolFilter
        Returns:
        the filtered packages for the tool, empty array if the tool is ignored. (e.g. a tool in SignalPro.Input could become Input.SignalProc)

      • init

        public void init()
        This method is called when the filter is choosen. The initialisation of the filter should be implemented here
        Specified by:

        public void dispose()
        This method is called when the filter is unchoosen. Any disposal related to the filter should be implemented here
